You are a code expert. Please use your professional knowledge to generate accurate and professional responses. Design and Implementation of "Star Trail" App Based on WeChat Mini Program

You are a code expert. Please use your professional knowledge to generate accurate and professional responses. Make sure the generated code is executable whenever possible. This concerns the design and implementation of the "Star Trail" app based on WeChat Mini Program.

The app allows users to set habit goals (such as early rising, reading, exercising, etc.), check in daily to record completion status, generates habit formation progress charts, provides habit-related knowledge and tips, includes reminder functionality, and supports social sharing and friend interaction encouragement. Complete code required.

checklist.title: Habit Goal Setting Functionality
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the code implements comprehensive habit goal setting features including habit categories, frequency settings (daily/weekly/custom), start date, end date, reminder time, and personalized icons/colors for different habits.

checklist.title: Check-in and Progress Tracking System
checklist.description: Review the implementation of the daily check-in mechanism, streak counting, and progress visualization. Check if the code handles edge cases like timezone differences, backdated check-ins, or missed days properly.

checklist.title: Data Visualization Components
checklist.description: Examine the implementation of progress charts and statistics visualization. Check for different chart types (line charts, heat maps, radar charts), time range selectors, and interactive elements in the visualization.

checklist.title: Notification and Reminder System
checklist.description: Assess the implementation of the reminder functionality, including scheduled notifications, customizable reminder messages, snooze options, and compliance with WeChat Mini Program notification constraints.

checklist.title: Code Robustness
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the code can handle common abnormal situations (such as network interruptions, permission denials, data inconsistencies) and provide friendly error prompts or recovery mechanisms.

checklist.title: Innovative Features
checklist.description: Check whether the code includes surprise features that enhance the experience (e.g., 1. AI-powered habit recommendations 2. Gamification elements like badges/achievements 3. Intelligent streak recovery options 4. Habit correlation analysis).

checklist.title: Feature Redundancy
checklist.description: Strictly check three types of redundancy: 1. Redundant implementations of similar functions (e.g., multiple notification systems) 2. Function modules unrelated to habit tracking 3. Fancy effects that affect performance in low-end devices.

checklist.title: Engineering Quality
checklist.description: Review modular design (separation of UI components, business logic, and data layer), component reusability, unit test coverage, and Mini Program best practices implementation.

checklist.title: Interface Design Quality
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the overall design follows modern mobile design principles: 1) Harmonious color matching suitable for a habit tracking app 2) Proper layout spacing optimized for various screen sizes 3) Professional typography system with clear visual hierarchy 4) Accessibility considerations for diverse users.

checklist.title: Interaction Fluidity and User Experience
checklist.description: Judge whether the dynamic effects conform to WeChat Mini Program best practices: 1) Responsive touch feedback 2) Smooth transitions between pages 3) Intuitive navigation patterns 4) Social sharing implementation quality 5) Friend interaction mechanisms.
